about_the_game:
Shadow of the Night : Monster is a battle against monsters on a deserted island and a struggle for survival.

Defend yourself against monsters as you fight hunger and thirst. Meanwhile, you can collect wood and burning materials, cut trees, make fires, cook meat and set a strategy with the materials you collect.

Survive with a variety of items in a goblin-filled environment in a vast island of 10 square kilometers. this adventure,
building, using weapons, is an effort to fight hunger and thirst.

Hunting

You can hunt goblins with rifles, bows and spears. Even though they are easy to kill, they are too numerous to push your limits.

Stay away from them as much as possible. After each goblin killed, another goblin will randomly respawn in a location.

Weapons such as rifles, bows and spears can be found by researching them in houses, mines and signal towers.

Regions

  • 10 square kilometers of island land and unique structures on this land.

  • Many regions are waiting for you to explore.

  • By visiting the regions, you can light a fire and cook meat whenever you want.

  • Key Features

  • Kill goblins and build for your own safety.

  • When you kill a goblin, a new goblin will spawn, increasing the difficulty.

  • If you are hungry or thirsty, light a fire or enter a house.

  • Satisfy your hunger by cooking on fire.

  • If you get sick, your fitness will decrease.

  • You can build various houses and cut trees in the game.

  • Cook raw meat, satisfy your hunger.

  • You can collect blackberries and feed yourself.

  • Activities have an impact on food, water, hunger, vitality and health values.
